description:
A Haibane who cared for the young http://anidb.net/ch26153 [Nemu] and http://anidb.net/ch26151 [Reki]. Despite her delicate health, she was kind and helpful to them.
Especially to Reki, as she collected the herbs required for the dye to hide Reki`s black wings even though she collapsed in her way back to http://anidb.net/ch26011 [Old Home].
name: Kuramori
